person.persName: Charles A. Bourland (Hopkins County farmer and later a doctor)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Educated by Prof. Phipps. Worked as a teacher for one semester and then in the dry goods business in the early 1860s. Lived in Hopkins County, Kentucky in 1860.
